title: White House reveals Rose Garden renovations, see photos of redesign
shortDescription: The White House’s iconic Rose Garden is looking a little less rosy after the president swapped greenery for granite.

title: Christie likens Trump to 'petulant child' over job data firing
shortDescription: "He needs someone to blame," Trump ally turned critic Chris Christie said after the president fired Bureau of Labor Statistics chief Erika McEntarfer.

title: How has the 119th Congress already set records, had unique moments?
shortDescription: Just over six months in, this Congress has witnessed all-nighters, extra-long votes and flaring personalities.

title: Top Trump aide accuses India of financing Russia's war in Ukraine
shortDescription: A top aide to President Donald Trump accused India of financing Russia's war in Ukraine by purchasing oil from Moscow.

title: Who is Charlamagne tha God? Trump calls radio host 'sleezebag'
shortDescription: Trump responded to Charlamagne tha God after the host said some Republicans will use the fight over the Jeffrey Epstein files to take the party back.

title: White House retreats from IVF coverage mandate despite campaign pledge
shortDescription: The White House won't mandate insurance cover IVF, despite Trump campaign promise of expanded access to fertility treatment, Washington Post reports.

title: Will Rural America give up on Trump? These activists think so.
shortDescription: Rural organizers say Medicaid and SNAP cuts could help Democrats win rural votes in 2026. Republicans say: Don't count on it.

title: Who will win Senate majority in 2026? These are 11 key races to watch.
shortDescription: From the South to the Great Lakes, contested primaries and open Senate seat battles will determine who's serving for President Trump's last two years.

title: Trump pick Jeanine Pirro wins Senate confirmation to U.S. attorney
shortDescription: Jeanine Pirro won Senate approval as US attorney in DC as Republicans raced to confirm a long list of President Donald Trump's nominees.

title: Smithsonian removed Trump from impeachment exhibit due to 'appearance'
shortDescription: The Smithsonian clarified on Aug. 2 that aesthetic reasons were behind the removal of a placard with references to Trump in an impeachment display.

title: Trump White House ballroom: A look back at Mar-a-Lago's Grand Ballroom
shortDescription: Renderings for the new White House ballroom are reminiscent of the Donald J. Trump Grand Ballroom that opened in 2005 at Mar-a-Lago in Palm Beach.

title: After 2024 wipeout, Democrats' shadow 2028 primary has begun
shortDescription: Kamala Harris, Gavin Newsom and Ruben Gallego are part of a diverse and large field of White House hopefuls tiptoeing toward the starting 2028 line.

title: Trump sends warning after Russia threats
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he's sending two U.S. nuclear subs to reposition after Dmitry Medvedev referenced the Soviet-era “dead hand” system.

title: Trump’s new tariffs: Winners and losers
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s new round of global tariffs is triggering major economic shifts. Here's who stands to gain and who’s taking the biggest hits.

title: What does TACO mean? Trump issues new tariffs after two delays
shortDescription: President Donald Trump issued a new slate of tariffs on Aug. 1, the second deadline after Liberation Day. TACO stands for 'Trump Always Chickens Out.'

title: Smithsonian responds after Trump removed from impeachment exhibit
shortDescription: "A future and updated exhibit will include all impeachments," according to a statement from the Smithsonian.

title: Trump orders firing of Labor statistics head after weak jobs report
shortDescription: Trump ordered the firing of Erika McEntarfer, the U.S. commissioner of Labor Statistics, accusing her without evidence of manipulating jobs figures.

title: Trump envoy visits troubled Gaza aid operation
shortDescription: Steve Witkoff visited a site run by the U.S.-backed Gaza Humanitarian Foundation in what he said was an effort to create a new aid plan.

title: Trump officials visit Gaza aid sites amid starvation crisis
shortDescription: Trump's Special Envoy to the Middle East Steve Witkoff visits Gaza strip amid Israel's starvation of Palestinians.

title: Who is Triple H? 'Strong guy' joined Trump in fitness test signing
shortDescription: Trump signed an executive order bringing back the presidential fitness test with Paul Levesque (Triple H), Harrison Butker and Lawrence Taylor.
